name: Concept Farm
description:
The Concept Farm is located in New York City with 35 Farmers collaborating across strategy, account management, creative, design, social media, measurement, and analytics. To harvest content with maximum efficiency, we also have a full suite of in-house production and post-production capabilities.
Over the last 19 years, Concept Farm and our clients have reaped a bumper crop of creative and efficacy accolades in our pursuit of cultivating brand passion together.
